articles.title: Trump renews threat to impose 100% tariffs on non-US made movies - BBC
articles.description: The president believes the American film-making industry has been "stolen" by other countries.
articles.content:
Pritti MistryBusiness reporter
Donald Trump has repeated his threat to impose a 100% tariff on all films not made in the US, claiming the American industry had been "stolen" by other countries.
He … [+3440 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert, Aditi Bharade
articles.title: This is the severance package Starbucks offered to laid-off staff at the stores it's closing - Business Insider
articles.description: The chain is closing about 1% of its stores in North America — more than 100 locations.
articles.content:
Starbucks presented its laid-off baristas with a severance package less than a week after it announced sweeping layoffs and store closures.
